text: Paul Strand (October 16, 1890 â€“ March 31, 1976) was an American photographer and filmmaker. He was one of those who helped that photography could be considered as an art form in the 20th century. His vast body of work, from six decades, shows plenty of genres and subjects across several continents, the Americas, Europe, and Africa. title: Paul Strand
